card.name: Carnage
card.property: When Revealed: Each player finds a copy of Carnage Spawn and reveals it. [star] Forced response: After Carnage attacks and damages you, heal damage from Carnage equal to the number of attachments attached to him.
"I am the ultimate Insanity! I am Carnage!"

card.name: Carnage
card.property: When Revealed: Find a copy of the Absolute Carnage side scheme and reveal it. [star] Forced response: After Carnage attacks and damages you, heal damage from Carnage equal to the number of attachments attached to him.

card.name: Carnage
card.property: Toughness. When Revealed: Find a set-aside CODEX attachment and reveal it. [star] Forced response: After Carnage attacks and damages you, heal damage from Carnage equal to the number of attachments attached to him.

card.name: Rejoin the Hive
card.property: Contents: Carnage (I) and Carnage (II). (Carnage (II) and Carnage (III) instead for expert mode.) Carnage, Symbiotic Cruelity and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Cult of Carnage). Setup: Set each CODEX card aside.
The codexes are attached to the DNA of everyone who has ever worn a symbiote.

alternate.name: Rejoin the Hive
alternate.property: Forced response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, place 1 symbiote counter here. Then, if there are at least 2 symbiote counters here, reveal a set-aside CODEX card and remove 2 symbiote counters from this card (find a CODEX card not in play instead, if there are no more set-aside CODEX cards.) If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Ghost rider's Codex
card.property: Attach to Carnage. [star] Carnage's attacks gain overkill. Hero Action: Spend a [energy] resource and place threat on the main scheme equal to the number of attachments attached to Carnage → discard this card. [amplify]

card.name: Grendel's Codex
card.property: Attach to Carnage. Carnage's attacks gain retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource and take damage equal to the number of attachments attached to Carnage → discard this card. [acceleration]

card.name: Scorn's Codex
card.property: Attach to Carnage. Reduce the amount of damage dealt to Carnage by 1. Hero Action: Spend a [mental] resource and discard cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of attachments attached to Carnage → discard this card. [crisis]

card.name: Venom's Codex
card.property: Attach to Carnage. Forced Interrupt: When Carnage attacks you, give him 1 additional facedown boost card. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card → discard this card. [hazard]

card.name: Ravencroft Institute
card.property: Surge. Victory 1. Forced Response: After any amount of threat is placed on a scheme, discard the same number of cards from the top of the encounter deck. Alter-Ego Action: Search the discard pile for Doppelganger and reveal him → put this cad on the victory display.

card.name: Carnage Spawn
card.property: When revealed: Discard the top card of your deck and the encounter deck. Forced Response: After Carnage Spawn attacks and damages you, discard the top card of your deck. [star] Boost: After this activation ends, reveal this card.

card.name: Doppelganger
card.property: Incite 2. Victory 2. In expert mode, this card gets +1 SCH, +1 ATK, and gains quickstrike. When revealed: if Doppelganger is revealed by any way other than with Ravencroft Institute's "Alter-Ego Action", discard him instead.

card.name: Absolute Carnage
card.property: Symbiote character get +1 ATK. [acceleration] [star] Boost: Give this enemy 1 additional boost card.
"Kill enough and I awake my God." -Carnage

card.name: Collect the Codex
card.property: Incite X, where X is equal to Carnage's stage number. When revealed: Place 1 symbiote counter on the main scheme. [star] Boost: if this attack defeats an ally, reveal this card.
"Everyone is a target!" -Carnage

card.name: Death's Grasp
card.property: When revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally you control. If you do, place 1 symbiote counter on the main scheme. If no ally was discarded this way, this card gain surge. When revealed (Hero): Carnage attacks you.
"This is between you and me.. or at least it was..." -Carnage

card.name: Dark Acolyte
card.property: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Dark Acolyte would attack, it schemes instead. When Defeated: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.
"God is coming! God is coming! God is coming!" -Church of Darkness

card.name: Demagoblin
card.property: Patrol. Toughness. When Revealed: Choose to either place 2 threat among schemes or take 2 indirect damage among players (choose both instead, if there is another Cultist enemy in play).

card.name: Man-Wolf
card.property: Guard. Toughness. When Revealed: Choose to either give Man-Wolf 1 facedown boost card or deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card (choose both instead, if there is another Cultist enemy in play).

card.name: Cult of Carnage
card.property: When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Then, they reveal that minion. [crisis]
"God is coming! God is coming! God is coming!" -Church of Darkness

card.name: God is Coming
card.property: When Revealed: Discard X cards from the top of your deck and the encounter deck, where X is equal to the number of Cultist enemies in play. If 2 or fewer cards were discarded from your deck this way, this cards gains surge. [star] Boost: If there is a Cultist enemy in play, reveal this card.

card.name: Improvised Weapons
card.property: Attach to the villain. [amplify] Hero Action: Spend [energy] [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Violent Edge
card.property: Attach to the villain. When Revealed: Take 1 damage. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, choose a player to take 1 damage. Hero Action: Spend a [energy] resource → discard this card. [star] Boost: This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Revel in Red
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an attachment is discarded. Reveal that card. If there is another attachment in play, take 2 damage.
"Being bad is so simple." -Carnage

card.name: Superiority Complex
card.property: When revealed: Choose X, where X is the villain's stage number: ° The villain schemes. ° This card gains surge. ° Take 2 indirect damage. ° Discard 1 card from your hand.
"You know my name... now scream it!" -Carnage
